messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant for Teqnovation Softwares.
What services do you offer?
We offer website development, mobile app development, AI chatbots, and machine learning solutions for businesses and individuals.
Who are your target customers?
Our target customers include small and medium-sized businesses, startups, and individuals looking for tech solutions.
Where is Teqnovation Softwares located?
We are based in Nyeri, Kenya.
How can I contact Teqnovation Softwares?
You can reach us via email at teqnovationsoftwares@gmail.com or call/WhatsApp us at 0795603184.
What are your business hours?
We operate from 8 AM to 5 PM, Monday to Friday.
How much does it cost to build a website?
Our website development starts at 25,000 KES for a basic 5-page business site. Prices vary depending on features and complexity.
Do you provide hosting and domain registration?
Yes! We can assist with domain registration and hosting setup to ensure your website is fully functional.
Can I get a chatbot for my business?
Yes! We build AI-powered chatbots that can be integrated into your website or WhatsApp to automate customer interactions.
How long does it take to build a mobile app?
A basic mobile app takes approximately 4-6 weeks to develop, while more complex applications may take longer.
What machine learning services do you provide?
We offer AI solutions like predictive analytics, data automation, and AI-powered chatbots for businesses.
Do you offer technical support for your services?
Yes, we provide ongoing technical support for our services, including troubleshooting, updates, and maintenance. Our team is available during business hours to assist you.
What happens if I encounter a problem with my website or app?
If you experience any issues, you can reach out to our support team at teqnovationsoftwares@gmail.com, and we will assist you as soon as possible.
Can you integrate third-party APIs into my project?
Yes! We specialize in integrating third-party APIs for payment gateways, analytics, and other business tools to enhance your project.
Do you provide training on how to use the software you develop?
Yes, we offer training sessions to ensure you understand how to use and manage the software we build for you.
